key_decisions.original_text: BAL DOS protection constraint enforced outside EVM at block receipt time
BAL DOS protection formula targets DevNet-3, not DevNet-2
DevNet-3 launch moved from February 25 to March 4
ETH/71 scoped as optional for DevNet-3; clients can participate without it
key_decisions.context: optional, clients can participate without it

key_decisions.original_text: Perf-devnet-2 requires CL chain relaunch due to finalized state loss
